contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|SKU}} '''SKU''' refers to a [[stock-keeping unit]], a unique identifier for each distinct product and service that can be purchased in business. It may also stand for: '''Universities''': * [[Sri Krishnadevaraya University]], a public university in Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh, India * [[Sidhhu Kanhu University]], situated in the indigenous peoples dominated area of Santhal Parganas region of Jharkhand, India * [[Syiah Kuala University]], a university in Banda Aceh, Aceh, Indonesia * [[Senri Kinran University]], a private university in Suita, Osaka, Japan, established in 2003 * [[Sangguniang Kabataan University]], an open university in the Philippines '''Other''': * ''Shoujo Kakumei Utena'' or ''[[Revolutionary Girl Utena]]'', a 1996 Japanese manga and 1997 anime * [[Young Communist League of Sweden (disambiguation)|Sveriges Kommunistiska Ungdomsförbund]], Young Communist League of Sweden * [[Safe Kids USA]], the United States' arm of the global network of Safe Kids Worldwide organizations based in Washington, D.C. * [[Sadhu Kochoonju Upadesi]] (1883–1945), famous Malayali Christian preacher, poet and composer * [[SWAT Kats Unplugged]], an animated television series * [[Simon Kurt Unsworth]] (born 1972), British writer of supernatural fiction * [[SKU Amstetten]], an Austrian association football club founded in 1997 * [[Skiu-Kaya]], two adjoining villages in Ladakh, India * [[Skyros Island National Airport]] in Skyros, Greece {{disambig}} [[fr:SKU]]
